description:
Amae Koromo’s powerful lead ends the first half of the match. She is keeping the other schools as far as possible. Most of the players haven’t been able to hide their state of shock from what just went on. Ikeda cuddles up to Fukuji; Momoko encourages Kajiki; Saki and Hisa hold hands and make a promise together. So, begins the second half.
Source: crunchyroll
